snippet.title: Sniper Fury Cinematic Trailer
snippet.description:
Sniper Fury is now LIVE on iOS, Android and Windows! 

Download here - http://gmlft.co/Play_SniperFury 

Official release date: Thursday, December 3rd!

The immersive experience and top notch quality of a polished shooter will soon be available with the accessibility of a  asual game.
The time for drastic action is now. We are calling for the best
sharpshooters in the world to join us as we take aim at
terrorism wherever it hides.
